Our Chairmn's Message

Chairman's Message

The college has a committed team of teachers who are the best in their chosen fields. The methodology followed to impart education is a good mix of conventional and sophistications utilizing latest in teaching-learning with innovation and best practices. Students are drawn to St. George College, not merely due to the quality of the academic discipline assiduously maintained, but also on account of its commitment to promote friendship and geniality as the hallmark in its campus. Over the years, we have gathered a fraternity of eminent lecturers and scholars, who stimulate discussion and dialogue both inside and outside the classrooms to ensure that the students enjoy learning of what is taught, in its entire ramification. The exposure we arrange with the corporate and professional groups as an integral part of the educational process prepares the students to skillfully apply the theories and concepts in the work situations to achieve results desired. We put in our best effort to help students pursue their goals, achieve their dreams and find their niches in society.With the expertise at our command and personnel of proven ability, I'm sure St. George College will soon become an institution of excellence catering to the growing needs of education and personality development.

John Doe

Principal

OMBR Layout, Banaswadi,
Bangalore. 560043
India
